properties.areaDesc: Eastern Tucker; Fayette Ridges; Eastern Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Westmoreland Ridges; Preston; Western Tucker; Garrett
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 3:03AM EST until January 18 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh PA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulation up
to two inches and ice accumulation up to a tenth of an inch.

* WHERE...Portions of southwest Pennsylvania, western Maryland
and northern West Virginia.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will transition to a mix of freezing
rain and sleet this morning. Precipitation will change to rain
as the afternoon progresses.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Please report snow or ice by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the
NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPittsburgh

The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania
Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on
driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania
roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway and
traffic conditions.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING
